{/* Hero Section */}

Welcome to ARMS Portal

Academic Resource Management System for Students and Faculty

{/* About Section */}

What is ARMS?

ARMS (Academic Resource Management System) is a centralized platform to manage and access academic resources like notes, syllabi, and previous year question papers from multiple universities.

{/* Features Section */}

Key Features

{/* Feature Card */}

Notes

Upload and access department-wise, semester-wise notes in PDF format.

Syllabus

Explore and update academic syllabi for different courses and universities.

Question Papers

Manage year-wise university question papers for exam preparation.

{/* Footer */}
Â© {new Date().getFullYear()} ARMS Portal | Developed by Gautav
); }; export default Home;
